pr_title: tables: Remove the use of bootstrap from tables.
pr_body:
<!-- Describe your pull request here.-->
**Remove the use of bootstrap from tables.**
Reimplement bootstrap table CSS which we currently use for zulip-web
to `app_components.css` and `markdown.css`(for help center tables),
and removing that CSS from `bootstrap.css`.

**Remove the use of bootstrap from table-bordered class.**
Reimplement bootstrap table-bordered CSS which we currently use
for zulip-web to `app_components.css` and remove that CSS from
`bootstrap.css`.

**Remove table and table-striped class from help center tables.**
We don't need `.table` and `.table-striped` class anymore on
help center pages as we direct applying CSS on `table` tag from
`markdown.css`.

Moving usable CSS of `.table` from `portico.css` to `mardown.css`.

**Remove unused bootstrap table CSS.**
Remove CSS from `bootstrap.css` which we applied on `.table` but
have no use of them currently.

**Remove unneeded CSS from table-bordered class.**
Currently as we are not making use of `tfoot` tag on `.table-bordered`,
this commit will remove CSS applied on `.table-bordered tfoot`.

Fixes: [CZO](https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/6-frontend/topic/Remove.20the.20use.20of.20Bootstrap.20from.20our.20tables.20.2E)

pr_title: custom_profile_fields: Allow display in user profile popover.
pr_body:
* Backend changes.

To allow `custom_profile_field` to display in user profile popover, added a new boolean field in its model class.

In `custom_profile_fields.py`, functions are edited as per conditions, like currently we can display max 2 `custom_profile_fields` except `LONG_TEXT` and `USER` type fields.

The default custom profile field is now updatable but for only the "display_in_profile_summary" field.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Frontend settings changes.

Custom profile fields table `CSS` changed to fit the new "Display" column of editable checkboxes, checkboxes are for select/deselect custom profile field to display in profile popover.

New option "Display in profile summary" added in create and edit custom profile fields form, with the help of this the user can pick max of 2 custom profile fields except for `LONG_TEXT` and `USER` fields to be displayed in his user profile popover.

Checkboxes will go in a disabled state(Adding tooltip) except for selected when the max limit of displaying custom profile fields reaches.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Frontend profile popover changes.

Displaying custom profile fields in user profile popover, as mentioned in the issue.

In `popovers.js` filtering out only those custom profile fields, which are not `LONG_TEXT` or `USER` fields and their values are not empty.

Custom profile fields rendering in profile popover the same way(code-wise) as in the user's full profile modal.

Using the custom profile field's name in lower case in the `fa` class, to get an icon of the external account.

`fa-{platform name}` this is the format of `fa` to fetch icon.
Created a new handlebar to convert a word into lower case.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[CZO discussion on #design](https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/101-design/topic/pronouns.20in.20profile.20card)

[CZO discussion on #api design](https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/378-api-design/topic/custom.20profile.20fields.20in.20small.20profile/near/1390650)

Fixes: #21215
